description.short: Smart survey & feedback bot for Microsoft Teams with AI insights
description.full:
TeamPulse revolutionizes team feedback with instant survey creation, real-time response collection, and AI-powered analytics. Create professional surveys from templates (HR, Customer, Training, 360Â°), gather anonymous responses, and get intelligent insights â€” all without leaving Microsoft Teams.

Features include:
â€¢ Pre-built professional templates
â€¢ Anonymous response collection
â€¢ Real-time analytics with AI insights
â€¢ Azure cloud storage
â€¢ Enterprise-grade security
â€¢ Easy integration with existing workflows

Trusted by organizations worldwide for streamlined feedback management.
